div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:52 am CDT

div.div: A chance of showers and thunderstorms, then showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm after 1pm. Cloudy, with a high near 64. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

A chance of showers and thunderstorms before midnight, then a slight chance of showers between midnight and 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. East wind around 5 mph becoming north after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 73. Northwest wind around 5 mph.
